aircraft.value: Pelican Cargo - AC-6543-187 at Central Command Hub

defect_observed.value: Intermittent power loss during flight operations. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Generator Control component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 29/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 30/08/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 30/08/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 03/09/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 03/09/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma
